homestead_block.description: homestead_block switch (nil no fork, 0 = already homestead)

dao_fork_block.description: dao_fork_block corresponds to TheDAO hard-fork switch block (nil no fork)

dao_fork_support.description: dao_fork_support defines whether the nodes supports or opposes the DAO hard-fork

eip150_block.description: eip150_block: EIP150 implements the Gas price changes (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/150) EIP150 HF block (nil no fork)

byzantium_block.description: byzantium_block: Byzantium switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already on byzantium)

constantinople_block.description: constantinople_block: Constantinople switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already activated)

petersburg_block.description: petersburg_block: Petersburg switch block (nil same as Constantinople)

istanbul_block.description: istanbul_block: Istanbul switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already on istanbul)

muir_glacier_block.description: muir_glacier_block: Eip-2384 (bomb delay) switch block (nil no fork, 0 = already activated)

berlin_block.description: berlin_block: Berlin switch block (nil = no fork, 0 = already on berlin)

london_block.description: london_block: London switch block (nil = no fork, 0 = already on london)

arrow_glacier_block.description: arrow_glacier_block: Eip-4345 (bomb delay) switch block (nil = no fork, 0 = already activated)

gray_glacier_block.description: gray_glacier_block: EIP-5133 (bomb delay) switch block (nil = no fork, 0 = already activated)

merge_netsplit_block.description: merge_netsplit_block: Virtual fork after The Merge to use as a network splitter

chain_id.description: chain_id is the id of the chain (EIP-155)

denom.description: denom is the denomination used on the EVM

decimals.description: decimals is the real decimal precision of the denomination used on the EVM

shanghai_time.description: shanghai_time: Shanghai switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on shanghai)

cancun_time.description: cancun_time: Cancun switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on cancun)

prague_time.description: prague_time: Prague switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on prague)

verkle_time.description: verkle_time: Verkle switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on verkle)

osaka_time.description: osaka_time: Osaka switch time (nil = no fork, 0 = already on osaka)

ChainConfig.title: Chain Config
ChainConfig.description: ChainConfig defines the Ethereum ChainConfig parameters using *sdk.Int values instead of *big.Int.
